nodes.title: Support of \n in property headers (closes #472), Support of FOOTERS clause in interactive form view in web-client (closes #473). ApiVersion 132 -> 133
#267 download libraries from the web-client when internet is unavailable
Files drag and drop whithout additional form
Full screen mode without modifying DOM
Implemented support of edit object on double click and in "link mode" (closes #420)
Implement WAIT / NOWAIT options for EMAIL operator
Allow action images to be dynamic (calculated and not set with literal) (closes #418)
GPivot: save and restore scroll left
[web] IntegralCellEditor: input type "number" for mobile num keyboard
Support PROPERTIES clause for CONSTRAINT operator (closes #311)
Client types: nativeDesktop, nativeMobile (future compatibility), webDesktop, webMobile
check empty string in import of integral types
Numbers - class with static methods to convert numbers to words
Implement MAXIMIZE / NORMALIZE button in web client (closes #393)
Pivot: EDIT event for a property on dblclk, filter / drill-down action on a row (closes #257, closes #362, closes #388)
Implement language interfaces for customizing list views and their parameters (closes #251)
filter images according to color theme
Make it possible to import / export nodes in hierarchical formats to string properties (closes #331)
invert background/foreground colors for dark theme
Show empty red underlined string instead of 'Required'
Опция showNotDefinedStrings. Если false (по умолчанию): пустая строка…
[Web]: Adjusted web themes to FlatLaf style (closes #364)
FlatLaf support in desktop client (closes #337, closes #270)
#258 Pivot table  support form properties column order
Words.toString removed extra space in the end (closes #336)
ikonli FontAwesome pack as a source for IMAGE in NAVIGATOR
Issue#254 Pivot table: support property draws formatter
Added language param to reverse geocoding
Get server settings in dev-mode without caching
Desktop client refactoring to match web client
Added "open in editor" link in the tooltips
Ignore fake blur events on input
Support Google / Yandex / OSM maps tiles in map view
EVAL in EVAL doesn't see parent module (closes #598)
Support fitBounds option in Map view
Fix get coordinates from address (Add google / yandex api-keys)
Support of interval date / dateTime / time types (closes #587)
Negative values for properties in DESIGN
Don't stop editing form when switching to another window (closes #567)
Fix slow pivot rendering on double click
Added support for custom DB port (default is also set)
Import form from xml with same property in PROPERTIES and FILTERS (closes #558)
Added support for double-clicking on attributes in the pivotUI
Added support for receiving messages and message history in messengers
Using external jar files, located on the application server, in Jasperreports (closes #548)
Fixed a bug with loading resources when internet is not available (closes #545)
Fixed a bug in the map view with editing / dragging (closes #539)
Fixed bug with the login page localization (closes #535)
Fix bug with cluster colors in map view (closes #533)
Fixed bug in calendar view when the background color is updated incorrectly  (closes #531)
Fixed Incorrect date-time patterns behaviour (now patterns are from OS regional params)
Fixed bug when closing all tabs in web-client (closes #526)
Fixed bug in parsing literal expression in property object (closes #524)
Get logics caption param from .properties file
Context fix for OBJECTS BACKGROUND / FOREGROUND
Correct LSF Stack in TRY CATCH
Panel and Cell options for CHANGEMOUSE and CHANGEKEY
check MAP / CALENDAR properties existance on finalizeAroundInit
Fix save files from resources in .jar
"Close all tabs" button in tab context menu
Clear and change property orders in one request (api version 136 -> 137)
Support LIST clause for ATTACH clause in EMAIL operator (closes #326)
Equal pattern for export DATETIME in Windows and Linux
Sorting directions are kept during onRefresh
OBJECTS BACKGROUND / FOREGROUND (background and foreground for row)
Error moving grid property in design
Declare params for data / abstract at the left part
Filter property update optimization (when used only for group change)
Last activity for connection not for user
